io.name: TCISPMCV0110101_INBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:TCISPMCV0110101_inbound" /> <complexType name="TCISPMCV0110101_inbound"> <sequence> <element name="bankCd"> <annotation> <documentation>은행코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="3" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

io.name: TCISPMCV0110101_OUTBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:TCISPMCV0110101_outbound" /> <complexType name="TCISPMCV0110101_outbound"> <sequence> <element name="gridRowcount"> <annotation> <documentation>목록건수</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="5" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="gridList" type="tns:GRID_LIST_TYPE"> <annotation> <documentation>목록배열</documentation> <appinfo> <p:adjustLength category="variableField" lengthFieldURL="GRID_ROWCOUNT" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> </appinfo> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="GRID_LIST_TYPE"> <sequence> <element name="bankCd"> <annotation> <documentation>은행코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="3" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="virtAcntBankBrnCd"> <annotation> <documentation>가상계좌은행지점코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="AS-IS 지점코드(BRCH_CD)" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="3" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="virtAcntSbjtCd"> <annotation> <documentation>가상계좌주제코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="AS-IS 항목(ITEM)" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="3" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>
